full_summary:
# Phase 2 EZ899-241616 Cell Window Glazing Replacement Tender

## Brief Description of Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this invitation to qualified suppliers for a Phase 2 solicitation to provide construction services for the replacement of glazing on windows and installation of polycarbonate external layers at the Kent Institution, located at 4732 Cemetery Road, Agassiz, BC.

## Tender Overview

- **Reference Number:** WS4436048500-Doc4469979388
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Publication Date:** March 2, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 27, 2024, at 14:00
- **Amendment Date:** March 20, 2024

## Key Details

- **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 29, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** January 17, 2025
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada and British Columbia

## Contracting Information

- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
- **End-User Entities:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
- **End-User Entities Address:** 340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0P9

## Contact Information

- **Contact Name:** Ken Ngan (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email:** ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone:** None
- **Contact Fax:** None

## Tender Method

This tender will be awarded using the Selective Tendering method, with the lowest price being the selection criteria. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

## Procurement Details

This tender is pursuant to the Invitation to Qualify and has been issued as a Selective Tendering process. The construction services to be provided include the replacement of glazing on windows and the installation of polycarbonate external layers at the Kent Institution.
